title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1038/92 of 27 April 1992 laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1038/92  of 27 April 1992  laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The issue of STM licences is hereby suspended until 30 April 1992 for fresh and chilled beef and veal.
2. Further applications for STM licences may be lodged from 20 April 1992.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 April 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
